Went to the suntec branch on 10th Jan. The manager was the one filling up the fries at 6.25pm and she did it lazily and only filling 60% of the all fries holders.

Once I got mine, i asked her to fill it until the holder is full. She looked at me very rudely and unapologetically and then deliberately only added 3 pcs of fries to piss me off. It was the manager in black uniform, who is a female (she has earstuds) but looks masculine with a short hair.

Also, the classic cheese angus beef had an undercooked patty. The meat was dripping pink liquid and looks pinkish inside and feels mushy.

Please ensure disciplinary actions are taken. Do you give customer service training at all to ur managers?
The chicken prosperity burgers that I bought have no hash brown at all. Feel so cheated.... Attractive photographs and advertisements but get different things in return 😡
